name: PHASEConeDirectivityModelParameters
desc: An object that directs sound in a cone-shaped curve that extends from a sound source.

items.name: init(subbandParameters: [PHASEConeDirectivityModelSubbandParameters])
items.desc: Creates an object that directs sound in a cone-shaped curve that extends from a sound source.

items.name: var subbandParameters: [PHASEConeDirectivityModelSubbandParameters]
items.desc: An array of frequencies that describe varying sound emission across the spectrum.
